channel.title: Comments on: New Unplugged Templates released

item.title: By: Matt White
item.dc:creator: Matt White
item.description:
In reply to <a href="/2012-9-26-new-unplugged-templates-released/#comment-93">Some one</a>.
<p>It is certainly "a" way to go, I've used it on other projects and it's great, in this case we went for jQuery Mobile, and in version 2 of this project we're actually moving away from that and going for a custom setup much more tailored to the Unplugged environment. Horses for courses.</p>
item.content:encoded:
In reply to Some one.

It is certainly "a" way to go, I’ve used it on other projects and it’s great, in this case we went for jQuery Mobile, and in version 2 of this project we’re actually moving away from that and going for a custom setup much more tailored to the Unplugged environment. Horses for courses.

item.title: By: Some one
item.dc:creator: Some one
item.description: <p>In terms of mobile development isn't twitter's bootstrap the way to go?</p>
item.content:encoded: In terms of mobile development isn’t twitter’s bootstrap the way to go?
